metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9234 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: In wpa_supplicant_8, there is a possible out of bounds read due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote information disclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10Android ID: A-122465453

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This CVE was assigned to Android, impact on Ubuntu is unknown No equivalent fix in upstream wpa source as of 2021-04-07

criterions.comment: wpa package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021-04-07').
